page.title: 17THE POPULATION OF BRAMPTON
page.content: The following statistics refer to the southern half of the village. There are 20 households, 14 of which possess 1 car, 3 have two cars & 3 are without a vehicle.Those households without a car have no member in paid employment.There are 3 children (from one family),6 retired couples & 2 widows.There are 4 farms (2 dairy & 2 beef) & a Post Office. Other occupations: 1 power station worker 1 British Gypsum worker (Kirkby Thore) 1 surveyor 1 carpenter 1 odd job man 1 shop assistant 1 banking official The furthest travelled to work is 55 miles,one travels 12 miles,3 travel 5 miles & 2 work locally.
